title: Load Testing with RedLine13
content:
Pricing for RedLine13 is fairly simple and straightforward. As our tagline implies, we’re all about (almost) free load testing. Here at RedLine13 we provide a central service that allows our users the ability to freely create an account, setup connections to your AWS account, configure and run load tests, view real time graphics and reports, and to see how much money was spent on your Amazon account for the test. Additionally users can opt for a range of paid, subscription-based accounts that grant them even more features. For your convenience we have outlined our various subscriptions, their costs, and the features that you get with each.

Features Free Subscription Basic Subscription Pro Subscription Enterprise Subscription
Supported Test Types
(JMeter, Gatling, Custom, LogFile, URL)		 All All All All
Number of Tests Unlimited Unlimited Unlimited Unlimited
Test Duration 1 Day Unlimited Unlimited Unlimited
Virtual Users Unlimited Unlimited Unlimited Unlimited
Users for JMeter-Selenium Unlimited Unlimited Unlimited Unlimited
Data Retention 30 days 1 Year 2 Years 2 Years
Number of Team Members 1 1 5 5
Number of AWS Keys 1 1 2 5
Number of Concurrent Tests 1 1 5 5
URLs Graphed per Test 100 100 300 300
Jenkins Continuous Integration ✓ ✓ ✓
Test Replay ✓ ✓ ✓
Team & Server Management ✓ ✓ ✓
Reporting Features ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓
Merged Results  ✓ ✓
Percentile Results ✓ ✓ ✓
API Access ✓ ✓ ✓
AWS Controls ✓ ✓ ✓
Firefox Add-On For Selenium + JMeter  ✓  ✓ ✓
Cost* Free  $50/Month or $500/Year  $120/Month or $1,000/Year  $2,500/Year
Purchase Purchase Purchase

* cost of each plan does not include the cost of the AWS spot instances (spot or on-demand)

Source: www.redline13.com/blog/2016/04/pricing-and-features/
